channel.title: Angelscae711
channel.description:
Developer Team Max Zach Rising Empire me -> Vincent /Apple
About Angelscape -Economy Based -Shops -Dominion tower -Prices -Bonuses -Packed npc's & shops -Cache -Re written combat -Item wielding fixes -Item bonus on equipment stats fix -Global objects & Npchandling & spawning -New teleportations -New exp rates -Fixed dupes -Fixed exp rates -New skills -Summoning scrolls perfected -Auras (Activating, Deactivating, Recharging) -30+ players registered -Dedicated server -Bosses -Friendly Staff -Lunars/Ancients/Moderns -Curses (With Quick Prayers) -All Weapon Special Attacks -Now Loading 711 -TokHar-Khal Cape -New Armours -Vps
PvP/Pking: - We have a perfected Pvp system. - We also have a lot of pkers who are into Hybridding, a well-known and fun type of pking. - Switching is near perfect (99% RS Speeds) - Storm of Armadyl, New boots, and more. - Armours such as Torva, Barrows, and PvP Armour Degrade when in use and when they are dropped in PvP.
PvM: - King Black Dragon with all attacks and effects - Tormented Demons with all 3 switches - Full Nex with all 4 stages (Flawless) - Close to 100% Godwars (Missing Armadyl will have up soon) - Corporeal beast with Impact hits and all correct attacks - Frost dragons - Dominion Tower - Barrows
PvP And PvM: - Near Perfect combat, 99.9% flawless - Full Summoning!! - Armour set effects all added! - Degrading Pvp Armours - Storm Of Armadyl Spell - Flawless Prayer system (Normal/Ancient Prayers) - [size=14pt]Polypore Staff !! full working[/size]
Miscellaneous: - All special attacks working properly for Most Weapons! - Quick Chat 100% - Flawless Music & Sound system - Perfect XP counter - Item On Item - NpcHandling - NpcSpawning - Configurations - Implements
Polypore Staff -> [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/r10rp4.png[/img]
Home -> [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/wvoda9.png[/img]
-> :)
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/21amo2f.png[/img]

item.title: Angelscae711
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

I actually thought this was a real development thread until I saw you posted your website and client link.

Use the server status page if you wish to advertise.

Edit: Thanks for removing links and good luck!

Read full topic

item.title: Angelscae711
item.dc:creator: @Nelson_x Nelson_x
item.description:
@Nelson_x wrote:

Developer Team
Max
Zach
Rising Empire
me -> Vincent /Apple

About Angelscape
-Economy Based
-Shops
-Dominion tower
-Prices
-Bonuses
-Packed npc’s & shops
-Cache
-Re written combat
-Item wielding fixes
-Item bonus on equipment stats fix
-Global objects & Npchandling & spawning
-New teleportations
-New exp rates
-Fixed dupes
-Fixed exp rates
-New skills
-Summoning scrolls perfected
-Auras (Activating, Deactivating, Recharging)
-30+ players registered
-Dedicated server
-Bosses
-Friendly Staff
-Lunars/Ancients/Moderns
-Curses (With Quick Prayers)
-All Weapon Special Attacks
-Now Loading 711
-TokHar-Khal Cape
-New Armours
-Vps

PvP/Pking:

  • We have a perfected Pvp system.
  • We also have a lot of pkers who are into Hybridding, a well-known and fun type of pking.
  • Switching is near perfect (99% RS Speeds)
  • Storm of Armadyl, New boots, and more.
  • Armours such as Torva, Barrows, and PvP Armour Degrade when in use and when they are dropped in PvP.

PvM:

  • King Black Dragon with all attacks and effects
  • Tormented Demons with all 3 switches
  • Full Nex with all 4 stages (Flawless)
  • Close to 100% Godwars (Missing Armadyl will have up soon)
  • Corporeal beast with Impact hits and all correct attacks
  • Frost dragons
  • Dominion Tower
  • Barrows

PvP And PvM:

  • Near Perfect combat, 99.9% flawless
  • Full Summoning!!
  • Armour set effects all added!
  • Degrading Pvp Armours
  • Storm Of Armadyl Spell
  • Flawless Prayer system (Normal/Ancient Prayers)
  • [size=14pt]Polypore Staff !! full working[/size]

Miscellaneous:

  • All special attacks working properly for Most Weapons!
  • Quick Chat 100%
  • Flawless Music & Sound system
  • Perfect XP counter
  • Item On Item
  • NpcHandling
  • NpcSpawning
  • Configurations
  • Implements
